creditline: Gift from the Collection of John and Robyn Horn
description: incomplete irregularly-shaped circle with central section covered with rusty, bent wire; black wedge on one side (half-circle on back)
text: In his <I>Disc Series<I>, Todd Hoyer breaks down the natural grain patterns of wood and the traditional, lathe-turned form by carving, burning, and wrapping it with wire.
title: Untitled
